title: Will AI Replace Bike Designers? Here’s What Canyon, Pinarello, Trek, and Yeti Have to Say
content:
Canyon, Pinarello, Trek and Yeti share insights on how artificial intelligence may, or may not be, designing your next bicycle

Read the full article at Will AI Replace Bike Designers? Here’s What Canyon, Pinarello, Trek, and Yeti Have to Say on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
